report.title: UKBMS Section Plot Japan Test Version
report.description: UKBMS specific: Lists occurrences at a section level - Test Version
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations transect JOIN locations section ON section.parent_id=transect.id JOIN samples ps ON ps.location_id = transect.id JOIN samples ss ON ss.parent_id=ps.id AND ss.location_id = section.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ss.id AND o.zero_abundance='f' JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id LEFT JOIN ( /* Use non-cache table for ordering, as common name specific sort orders are not copied to cache table. Japan has specific sort orders. */ SELECT cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id as taxon_meaning_id, min(ttl_common.taxonomic_sort_order) as taxonomic_sort_order, string_agg(cttl_common.taxon, ',' ORDER BY cttl_common.id) as combined FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_common JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl_common on ttl_common.id = cttl_common.id WHERE cttl_common.language_iso = '#language_iso#' AND cttl_common.preferred = false AND cttl_common.taxon_list_id = (#taxon_list_id#) GROUP BY cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id, ttl_common.taxonomic_sort_order) common ON common.taxon_meaning_id = cttl.taxon_meaning_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND transect.deleted=false AND transect.id = #location_id# AND #website_filter# AND transect.location_type_id = #location_type_id#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: language_iso
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the country
